channel.title: Didn't see Off Topic forum, so I'll see here
channel.description:
A while back I had it to where I was logged into sythe until I logged myself out. Then one day I got logged out, and ever since then I had to log in whenever I visited sythe.org
Well just last week or so I tried logging in, but it just brings me back to the forum index. I can log in, can't see registered forums, just like I never logged in. I type in a wrong pass, and it says wrong pass blah blah. I type in correct pass, brings me back to the index like nothing happened. What's wrong? I've tried Opera (main browser), IE and FireFox, all same problem.

item.title: Didn't see Off Topic forum, so I'll see here
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

kmb:

Happens to me with some forums too :/. Choose the "Log me on automatically each visit" thingie, put your user + pass in teh boxes and it will log you in. You have to do this every time you log in.

this happens to me on sythe.org also

Read full topic
